pkgmetadata.longdescription: Wavelet Functional ANOVA Through Markov Groves // Functional denoising and functional ANOVA through wavelet-domain Markov groves. Fore more details see: Ma L. and Soriano J. (2018) Efficient functional ANOVA through wavelet-domain Markov groves. arXiv:1602.03990v2 [stat.ME].
